trans-unit.source: Represents a linked or embedded control on a document.
trans-unit.target: 表示文档上链接的控件或嵌入式控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite> is returned when you use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.AddControl%2A> method to add a control to a document.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite>使用时返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection.AddControl%2A>方法以向文档添加控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: Activates the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: 激活 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />。

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 复制到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Cuts the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 剪切到剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: 删除 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in points, of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 的高度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The height, in points, of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 的高度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape" /> of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 的基础 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape" /> of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: 基础<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape" />的<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite.InlineShape%2A> property enables you to get the exact position of the control on the document.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite.InlineShape%2A>属性使您能够获得文档上控件的确切位置。

trans-unit.source: If the wrapping style of the control is not set to `In line with text`, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite.InlineShape%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件的换行样式未设置为`In line with text`、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite.InlineShape%2A>属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance, in points, from the left edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> to the left edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 的左边缘到该文档的左边缘的距离（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in points, from the left edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> to the left edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 以磅为单位，距左边缘的距离<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />到文档的左边缘。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Selects the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: 选择 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 的基础 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: 基础<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" />的<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite.Shape%2A> property enables you get the exact position of the control on the document.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite.Shape%2A>属性使您可以获得文档上控件的确切位置。

trans-unit.source: If the wrapping style of the control is set to `In line with text`, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite.Shape%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件的换行样式设置为`In line with text`、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite.Shape%2A>属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance, in points, from the top edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> to the top of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 的上边缘到该文档的顶部的距离（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in points, from the top edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> to the top of the document.
trans-unit.target: 以磅为单位，从上边缘的距离<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />到文档顶部。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width, in points, of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 的宽度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The width, in points, of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlSite" /> 的宽度（以磅为单位）。
